apa­wath wuna garu nahimi dawul dena wipa­thak wuna eya hama sith thawul dena upa­nath dewlowe kala pin kusal gena sapa­wath niwan patha­nemu api siyal dana his wi giya heyin saku bas maharu ketha thos kota nawatha sarasa gatha yuthuwa atha wiskam nosa­ngawa oba hada­ma­ndala matha dasnak kara mudanu mana saku sonduru katha daha­mata ladiwa sara­sawi sip sathara dena saha­yo­ga­yen mada pili­wetha hasu­ru ­wana maha­na­himi aduwa sapu­rana tharala mina maha adu­ri­ndu­thu­mani, oba misa kawuru wena saku basa usu­ru­wana wita dewi­wa­run basa aku­rata sumata pili­thuru kala yuthuya basa muku­litha nowa­nnata apa lakma­wage asa wiku­mathi pela­ha­rak penwanu idiri pasa sanda­ma­nda­la­kin ena somi ras dahara dowa pada banda saku magada elu basa rasaya nawa winda winda rasa pahasa dennen hadehi howa ada suru­guru obayi pera’para dediga pawa numbaa gaba sanda mandala lesa nangi morana saba mada gatalu hara di wiyath thirana baba­lana owa mini di shilpa dharana oba kala yuthuwa atha saku wikuma purana solwa obe nana paba­ndum eliya didi 'kalpa­latha', 'nana silu­mina' tharaga wadi mal hata­gani 'du githaya' suwanda windi dul kara thaba­nanta mage podi danuma madichandrika disa­na­yaka pini­binda sitha pini­bindu wati muwa matha bindi wisiri yalith mihi matha iki gasa ra pura deduwe sonduru aha­sata pidu sene­hasa tharaka mal pipi hina­huna sonduru ahase ruwata pem banda wala salu­wak nangi hinahi peni dis wana maha apu­ruwa!
